long_desc: You have awakened the mighty servant to the pharoahs, Ramses.
flags_raw: As your light spills over his face and body, you can see his features
stats1_raw: begin to fill out, swell, and harden, until an apparently healthy man
stats2_raw: stands before you, clad only in the raiments he was left in when he last
stats3_raw: slept.  His hair is a soft black, his skin a deep chocolate, and his
